data.title: human · GitHub Topics · GitHub
data.meta_description: GitHub is where people build software. More than 100 million people use GitHub to discover, fork, and contribute to over 420 million projects.
data.text:
A collection of resources on digital human including clothed people digitalization, virtual try-on, and other related directions.

This project is a digital human that can talk and listen to you. It uses OpenAI's GPT to generate responses, OpenAI's Whisper to transcript the audio, Eleven Labs to generate voice and Rhubarb Lip Sync to generate the lip sync.
